item.title: Flutter Ayatnesia Qur'an Search
item.description: Flutter Ayatnesia Quran Search is a mobile and backend app that aims to complete my final year project.

item.title: Flutter Doctor Appointments
item.description: This is a case study focused on creating user interfaces (UI) to hone skills in building reusable widgets with Flutter.
